00008 #include "mt/proto/smpp/common/Utils.h"
00009 
00010 namespace mt {
00011 namespace smpp {
00012 
00013 
00014 uint8_t Utils::m_udhSmsId = 0;
00015 
00016 std::vector<MessagePart>* Utils::segmentateSmsBody(const uint8_t* msg,
00017                 uint32_t len) {
00018 
00019         std::vector<MessagePart>* vect = new std::vector<MessagePart>;
00020         MessagePart part;
00021 
00022         if (len <= MAXSMSLENGTH) {
00023                 char* ptr = new char[MAXSMSLENGTH];
00024                 memcpy(ptr, msg, len);
00025                 part.first = ptr;
00026                 part.second = len;
00027                 vect->push_back(part);
00028         } else {
00029 
00030                 char count = 1;
00031                 unsigned int cur = 0, partLen;
00032 
00033                 struct UdhHeader udh;
00034                 size_t udhLen = sizeof(udh);
00035                 udh.length = 0x05;
00036                 udh.refNum = 0x00;
00037                 udh.size = 0x03;
00038                 udh.msgId = m_udhSmsId++;
00039 
00040                 uint8_t endPart = 0;
00041                 if(len % (MAXSMSLENGTH - 6)){
00042                         endPart = 1;
00043                 }
00044 
00045                 udh.total = len / (MAXSMSLENGTH - 6) + endPart;
00046                 //              m_logger->debug("total len is %d, part count is %x\n", len, udh.total);
00047 
00048                 do {
00049                         char* ptr = new char[MAXSMSLENGTH];
00050                         udh.partNum = count++;
00051                         memcpy(ptr, &udh, udhLen);
00052 
00053                         if (cur + MAXSMSLENGTH - udhLen < len) {
00054                                 memcpy(ptr + udhLen, msg + cur, MAXSMSLENGTH - udhLen);
00055                                 partLen = MAXSMSLENGTH;
00056                         } else {
00057                                 memcpy(ptr + udhLen, msg + cur, len - cur);
00058                                 partLen = len - cur + udhLen;
00059                         }
00060 
00061                         part.first = ptr;
00062                         part.second = partLen;
00063 
00064                         vect->push_back(part);
00065                         cur += partLen - udhLen;
00066 
00067                 } while (cur < len);
00068         }
00069         return vect;
00070 }
00071 
00072 }
00073 }
